column5: We are trying to decide on either Caribou Lake near Armstrong or Onaman River for a week tent camping/ fishing for walleye and pike. Any info is greatly appreciated. Thanks Wally
If you are island camping I would go Armstrong lots of water to get wind whipping on east side. Good luck and have fun
Hey thanks, Shane, we probably will camp at Forest Lodge; pm me if you have any more information. Thanks, Doug from Skandia, MI in the UP, USA
